common.name: Name
common.loadingMessage: We are making sure all your data is available.

auth.signInWithEmailDesc: Enter your email and password to sign in.
auth.createAccountDesc: Enter your email and password to create an account.
auth.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, digits, and symbols.
auth.checkEmailConfirmation: Please check your email to confirm your account.
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.checkEmailReset: Please check your email for a link to reset your password.
auth.linkExpiredDesc: This password reset link has expired or is invalid. Please request a new one.
auth.manageFinances: Manage your finances with ease. Free, secure, and designed for everyone.

dashboard.financialSummary: Here's a summary of your financial insights for {{year}}.

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.description: Manage your monthly expenses, view payment periods, and track your payment status.
expenses.addExpenseDescription: Create a new expense by entering its details below.
expenses.editExpenseDescription: Update the details of your expense. Changes will not affect past reports.
expenses.fromGroupDescription: Create expenses from a template group. This will create one expense for each template in the group.
expenses.exchangeRateHint: If the exchange rate is left empty, the system will retrieve its value from an external API.
expenses.addAtLeastOneAmount: Please add at least one amount.
expenses.failedToSave: Failed to save expense. Please try again.
expenses.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
expenses.deleteConfirmGeneric: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? This action cannot be undone.

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: Create and manage expense templates for quick expense creation.
templates.createTemplateDescription: Create a template to quickly create expenses with the same currency and amounts.
templates.editTemplateDescription: Update the template details. Changes will not affect already created expenses.
templates.deleteTemplateDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this template? This action cannot be undone.
templates.recurringBillsDesc: Templates for recurring expenses billed on a regular basis.
templates.quickTemplatesDesc: Templates for one-time or non-recurring expenses. No set billing date.
templates.noRecurringTemplatesDesc: A recurring template is a template that repeats on a specific day of the month.
templates.noQuickTemplatesDesc: A quick template is a one-time expense template without a set billing date.
templates.amountOptionalHint: Amount is optional. If provided, it will be pre-filled when creating expenses from this template.
templates.recurrenceDayHint: The day of the month when this bill is due
templates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
templates.addAtLeastOneCurrency: Please add at least one currency.

groups.title: Template groups
groups.description: Organize templates into groups for batch expense creation.
groups.createGroupDescription: Create a group to batch-create expenses from multiple templates at once.
groups.editGroupDescription: Update the group name and its templates. Changes will not affect already created expenses.
groups.deleteGroupDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this group? This action cannot be undone. The templates in this group will not be deleted.
groups.noTemplatesForGroups: Create templates first to make groups
groups.noTemplatesInGroup: No templates found in this group
groups.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone. The templates in this group will not be deleted.
groups.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one template for the group.
groups.baseDateHint: For recurring templates, their recurrence day will be used instead.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account preferences and application settings.
settings.primaryCurrencyDesc: Your default currency for displaying totals and conversions.
settings.paymentPeriodsDesc: Customize how expenses are grouped by payment period.
settings.startBeforeEnd: Period {{period}}: Start day must be before end day
settings.accountDesc: Your account information and profile settings.
settings.exportDataDesc: Download your expenses and settings as CSV or JSON.
settings.csvHint: Best for importing into Excel or Google Sheets.
settings.jsonHint: Includes all data including templates and settings.
settings.languageDesc: Select your preferred language for the application.
settings.adjustAvatarDescription: Drag the image and use the zoom slider so it fits nicely inside the circle.
settings.dragToReposition: Drag inside the circle to reposition
settings.avatarCropFailed: Couldn't crop the image. Please try another photo.

onboarding.title: Let's personalize your account
onboarding.subtitle: Share a few details so we can finish setting everything up.

profile.title: Your details
profile.description: Add your first and last name so we know how to address you.
profile.hint: You can update this later in Settings.

avatar.title: Profile photo
avatar.description: Upload a picture so people recognize your account.
avatar.hint: Square images with good lighting look best.

language.title: Language preference
language.description: Pick the language you want to use across the app.
language.hint: You can change this at any time from Settings.

finance.title: Currency & payment periods
finance.description: Set your default currency and how you break down each month.
finance.hint: Customize this now so reports match the way you get paid.

errors.names: Enter both your first and last name to continue.
errors.avatar: Please upload a profile photo before continuing.
errors.language: Select your preferred language to continue.
errors.currency: Select your primary currency to continue.
errors.periods: Review your payment periods before continuing.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

onboardingModal.title: We're thrilled you joined the app!
onboardingModal.description: Let's start by setting up your profile. Head over to Settings to add your name, photo, preferred language, and payment periods.

stocks.title: Stocks
stocks.description: Track your stock vesting periods and calculate net proceeds after taxes and broker costs.
stocks.addPeriodDescription: Add a new stock vesting period with the vesting date, quantity, and price.
stocks.editPeriodDescription: Update the details of this vesting period.
stocks.deletePeriodConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this vesting period? This action cannot be undone.
stocks.noPeriods: No vesting periods found for this year.
stocks.quantityRequired: Please enter a valid quantity (must be greater than 0).
stocks.priceRequired: Please enter a valid stock price.
stocks.notesPlaceholder: Optional notes about this vesting period
stocks.settingsDescription: Configure tax rates and broker costs for stock calculations.
stocks.usTaxHint: Withholding tax rate for US stocks (e.g., 30 for 30%).
stocks.localTaxHint: Your local income tax rate on stock proceeds.
stocks.brokerCostHint: Fixed broker fee applied to each vesting period.
stocks.invalidUsTax: US tax rate must be between 0 and 100.
stocks.invalidLocalTax: Local tax rate must be between 0 and 100.
stocks.invalidBrokerCost: Broker cost must be 0 or greater.
stocks.deductionsExceedGross: Warning: Taxes and costs exceed gross amount
stocks.otherDeductionsDescription: Applied to gross minus US taxes and broker cost.
stocks.deductionNameRequired: Each deduction must have a name.
stocks.invalidDeductionAmount: Deduction amount must be 0 or greater.
stocks.invalidDeductionPercentage: Percentage deduction must be between 0 and 100.

aguinaldo.title: Aguinaldo
aguinaldo.description: The 13th salary (Aguinaldo) is calculated based on your gross salaries from December of the previous year through November of the current year. The formula is:
aguinaldo.salariesDescription: Enter your gross salaries per payment period. The system will automatically your aguinaldo (13th salary).

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your privacy is our priority. We do not sell or share your data with third parties. All your information is securely stored and only used to provide you with the best experience possible.
privacy.intro: This privacy policy applies to the SJ Financial Tracker app (hereby referred to as "Application") for mobile devices that was created by Steven Jimenez (hereby referred to as "Service Provider") as a Free service. This service is intended for use "AS IS".

sections.title: Information Collection and Use
paragraphs: The Application collects information when you download and use it. This information may include details such as:
list: Your device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address)
The pages of the Application that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages
The time spent on the Application
The operating system you use on your mobile device
afterList: The Application does not gather precise information about the location of your mobile device.
The Service Provider may use the information you provide to contact you from time to time with important information, required notices, or marketing promotions.

For a better experience, while using the Application, the Service Provider may require certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to Email, Name, User ID, Financial Info, and User Content. The information requested will be retained and used as described in this privacy policy.

sections.title: Third Party Access
paragraphs: Only aggregated, anonymized data is periodically transmitted to external services to help the Service Provider improve the Application and its service. The Service Provider may share your information with third parties in the ways described in this privacy statement.
sections.listTitle: The Service Provider may disclose User Provided and Automatically Collected Information:
list: as required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena, or similar legal process;
when they believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect their rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request;

with their trusted services providers who work on their behalf, do not have an independent use of the information disclosed to them, and have agreed to adhere to the rules set forth in this privacy statement.

sections.title: Opt-Out Rights
paragraphs: You can stop all collection of information by the Application easily by uninstalling it. You may use the standard uninstall processes available as part of your mobile device or via the mobile application marketplace or network.

sections.title: Data Retention Policy
paragraphs: The Service Provider will retain User Provided data for as long as you use the Application and for a reasonable time thereafter. If you'd like the Service Provider to delete User Provided Data submitted via the Application, please contact them at {{email}} and they will respond within a reasonable time.

sections.title: Children
paragraphs: The Service Provider does not use the Application to knowingly solicit data from or market to children under the age of 13.

The Service Provider does not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children and encourages parents or guardians to monitor their children's Internet usage. If you believe a child has provided personally identifiable information through the Application or Services, please contact the Service Provider at {{email}} so the necessary actions can be taken. You must also be at least 16 years of age to consent to the processing of your personally identifiable information in your country (in some countries a parent or guardian may do so on your behalf).

sections.title: Security
paragraphs: The Service Provider is concerned about safeguarding the confidentiality of your information and provides physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards to protect information that is processed and maintained.

sections.title: Changes
paragraphs: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time for any reason.

The Service Provider will notify you of any changes by updating this page with the new Privacy Policy. You are advised to consult this Privacy Policy regularly for any changes, as continued use is deemed approval of all changes.
This privacy policy is effective as of {{effectiveDate}}.

sections.title: Your Consent
paragraphs: By using the Application, you consent to the processing of your information as set forth in this Privacy Policy now and as amended by us.

sections.title: Contact Us
paragraphs: If you have any questions regarding privacy while using the Application, or questions about these practices, please contact the Service Provider via email at {{email}}.
